SELECT id, username, nickname, mobile, `backup`, delete_status, create_time, update_time, version FROM t_sys_user WHERE 1 = 1
AND username LIKE CONCAT('%',#{sysUser.username},'%')
AND nickname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{sysUser.nickname},'%')
AND mobile LIKE CONCAT('%',#{sysUser.mobile},'%')
ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT u.id, u.nickname `name` FROM `t_sys_user` u JOIN t_sys_user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id JOIN t_sys_role r ON ur.role_id = r.id WHERE r.role_token = 'agentWorker'
AND (u.mobile LIKE CONCAT('%',#{mobileOrUsername},'%') OR u.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{mobileOrUsername},'%'))
AND u.id NOT IN ( SELECT ai.user_id FROM t_agent_info ai WHERE ai.parent_id != 0)
